sentences.english: You can adjust for that by using made-up conversion rates known as Purchasing Power Parities , or PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用取得的转换率，即购买力平价对其进行调整。

sentences.english: The new standardwas set according to what economists call purchasing power parity.
sentences.chinese: 新的标准是根据经济学家所说的购买力平价而设定的。

sentences.english: People in Guangzhou have huge purchasing power.
sentences.chinese: 广州人的购买力更是让人惊叹。

sentences.english: Lower-tiered cities have a higher purchasing power.
sentences.chinese: 低等级的城市有着更高的购买力。

sentences.english: Now, years of doing this (a.k.a “deleveraging”) have restored purchasing power. Debts have been reduced or eliminated;
sentences.chinese: 如今，数年的“休养生息”重新塑造了强大的购买力。

sentences.english: Now, years of doing this (a.k.a “deleveraging”) have restored purchasing power.
sentences.chinese: 如今，数年的“休养生息”重新塑造了强大的购买力。

sentences.english: A stronger yuan will also boost purchasing power for the Chinese consumer.
sentences.chinese: 同时，人民币走强也增加了中国消费者的购买力。

sentences.english: Currently the world economy is $74 trillion on a purchasing power parity basis.the
sentences.chinese: 目前世界经济按购买力平价计算为74万亿美元。

sentences.english: Your purchasing power represents funds available to you to establish new positions.
sentences.chinese: 你的购买力就表明你拥有的资金去建立一个新的盘口。

sentences.english: Who wants to have their dollar lose their purchasing power?
sentences.chinese: 谁希望他们手中的美元失去购买力呢？

sentences.english: On the flipside, rising wages will increase the purchasing power of Chinese consumers.
sentences.chinese: 从相反方面看，加薪将增加中国消费者的购买力。

sentences.english: The third column calculates Big Mac PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 第三列是巨无霸购买力平价。

sentences.english: Other elderly people resort to petty theft to increase their meager purchasing power.
sentences.chinese: 一些老人小偷小摸，以增加他们微薄的购买力。

sentences.english: This quantitative easing steals from the purchasing power of the incomes and savings of all Americans.
sentences.chinese: 这种定量宽松窃取所有美国人的收入和储蓄的购买力。

sentences.english: All the attention to Chinese tourists, is due to their increased purchasing power.
sentences.chinese: 所有对中国游客的关注是由于他们的购买力增加。

sentences.english: Every method of manipulating purchasing power is by necessity arbitrary.
sentences.chinese: 任何操纵货币购买力的方法都必然是武断的。

definition: measures of national income and output
